content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 23:40 bst on 15/08/2014 i was standing in my garden (facing roughly north) having a cigarette and watching the night sky as i often do. it was a clear night with no cloud, the local light pollution level was quite low and there was no moon visible at the time.

i looked to my right (east) and noticed a diamond shaped object moving across the sky at high speed with the short axis being the direction of travel. the object was giving off a fairly dim red-orange glow and had a steady, dull, white light at each point. the object moved in a straight line, almost overhead, east to west then started to veer north as it was about to pass out of sight.

although i could not be sure, i had the impression that the object was at a fairly high altitude. there was no sound and it covered the visible area of sky in 10 to 15 seconds. in comparison, an airliner crossing the same area of sky is visible for at least 2 minutes. the widest point of the object, from my viewing position, was about 2 inches which means that if it was at high altitude it was very large.

being a former member of the raf i am familiar with many types of high speed aircraft. if it had been a fast military aircraft (there are no fast jets based within 100 miles) then even at 10-15000 ft, an altitude that would make it appear slightly smaller than the observed object, i would have clearly heard the engines but,as previously stated, there was absolutely no sound from this craft.

i felt privileged to have observed this event but am fully aware that many of these sightings end up having a very mundane explanation.
content.summary: Diamond shaped object passed overhead at high speed.

content.detailedDescription: I wrote all i seen to peter davenport. it took a long time to type all i have seen. so if you email me ill forward it to you .I even have 1 pic. so if i get  email ill forward it back to you..
content.summary: Seen more than 1 time

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on i-75 in detroit mi in the north east sky i seen 7 red orange glowing sphere like objects. then they started to fade in color i know they weren't flares because of the perfect l shaped pattern they were in
content.summary: 7 red orange lights in a l shape hovering glowing bright

content.detailedDescription: after caring for my horses i always stand under the sky for some time and look at the night sky.  i  noticed a very bright star like light lower in altitude than a jet, moving slightly slower than the jets that fly over.  it was coming towards me out of the nw heading e se.  it glided directly overhead absolutely silently and continued on until i lost sight of it due to trees.  as it had just passed over me i heard a jet coming from the w sw, it passed slightly behind the light so their paths actually crossed.  lppthe jet had to have seen this bright light which remained just a single white star like light.  there were no blinking lights from any angle as there were and are on the jets, planes and helicopters that pass over here.  the only noise i heard was from the jet which appeared to be at a higher altitude.  this is the fourth time in the last three years that i have seen things i could not identify at our home in the night sky between the hours of 9 and 10 p.M.  one last summer where there were two lights similar to last night however at a very high rate of speed they both suddenly changed direction without stopping, just a sharp turn.  they were heading w and turned heading se.  saw the same bright light during the day approximately three weeks ago also heading e.  it cannot be the headlight on a plane as it remains constant, coming, overhead or going.  the light itself is just different, maybe a purer light.
content.summary: Watched a very bright whitish light coming from the nw to overhead heading e, se.  no noise.

content.detailedDescription: I was saying buy to a friend leaving my house.  i saw a bright red ball in the sky saturday night in mount sinai, ny... i was on cedar beach with my back facing the long island sound. i was looking over the harbor when i saw a bright red ball going from west to east then changed to orange, yellow then finally white, where it just sat there for about 8 mins, it then came down right above the tree line where it sat there for about 12 mins then vanished!!! it was absolutely crazy!
content.summary: Bright red ball then to orange, yellow then white and stood there.

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday august 16th at about midnight i was driving home from big bend national park on i-10 going to houston. as i was driving i saw a extremely bright green light in the sky. after it appeared my girlfriend shouted "did you see that?!?!?!" i was still in shock as she said that so it took a few seconds to reply... at first we thought it might have been a meteorite but there was no trail behind it. thought it might have been an airplane but it was moving extremely fast and was only visible for about 1/2 of a second. it couldn't have been a satellite or shooting star because it appeared to be flying at the same height as an airplane...

the next morning when we woke up i decided to check the news to see if anyone else saw the light. nothing in our area but for some reason there was an actually news clip on yahoo news of a bright green ball flying in the sky during a forest fire. when we saw that we had an instant chill run down our spine! 

we weren't able to snap pics because the light only lasted about one half of a second...
content.summary: Green ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
Date 15 june 2014
 here in baroda i'm an student of civil engineering at this date i have to go for educational tour on dam construction , after visiting we all returning by bus and and at one spot we stopped for refreshing.. that's moment i never forget
 the thing is that i go for toilet on side of road and my friends are on other side of road at that time i saw on sky and suddenly something passed away upper me slowly. that approximately 1. 1.5 km away from me and didn't sound.I chain up my jeans and ran behind it .Once hr stopped and i feel that it's saw me and after 2-3 min its flew away in 1-2 sec. thats it.
content.summary: It's fly and don't sounding , i just want to know that what happens next but it flew away in other direction.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, son and i had taken a ride on skyline drive, north of waynesboro, va on july 21, 2013.  i'm fairly certain that was the date of my photograph.  there was an overlook with beautiful scenery where we stopped to take some pictures that faced nw over the shenandoah national forest.  i took a series of pictures with our digital camera which has an art setting to bring out all the colors and i used that setting because of the truly beautiful view.  

the pictures all turned out just fine but i never really examined them very closely.  it wasn't until a couple weeks ago that i was looking for a nice cover shot for my fb account when i noticed a dark dot in one of the photos we took about a year ago.  i zoomed in on it and it looked like something i couldn't identify.  it looks too big to be a bird at that distance, compared to the background.  it's also too low (in my opinion) to be an aircraft and doesn't look like one to me.  

a couple people suggested that i send it in to mufon.  none of us observed the object during our time at the overlook, so i can't give any description of movements.  i will say that i have other pictures that were taken at that same spot at the same time... with no sign of the object or any birds.  the object just appears in one photo.  

please zoom in on it and i'd be curious to know your thoughts.  thanks.
content.summary: Noticed a strange flying object on a photograph i took in july of 2013

content.detailedDescription: I was camping at the harrison river rv park on august 16th with my husband.  they show an outdoor movie in the evening at 9 pm. the movie was just starting when a woman in the crowd commented on a comet in the sky.  my husband got up from his chair to see what she was looking at and stated that it wasn't a comet. i stood up immediately to see a comet-like object moving very fast in the sky to the south.  i then saw it change direction and move in the opposite direction and then completely disappear.  my husband saw it change direction at least four times.
content.summary: Saw

content.detailedDescription: I decided 2 have a early sunday night sleep.My bed is stationed by my window in which i often look up at the stars and tonight was a windy and most clearest night in months.I live on the main flight path 2 heathrow,so say every couple of minutes a plane flys over.Anyway, it was getting to about 10, in the evening and the last bit of light was fading when a jet was passing overhead,it was about half a kilometre ahead of my house when in the corner of my left eye above the local school playgound i noticed a light ambered light. as i focused in on it their were 3 ambered lights in total and i could see it was a huge transparent triangle which had rounded edges where the lights were.It slowly came 2 a halt about 300-500 feet above me and say about 100-150 in front of me.It made no noise what so ever,im not sure if the high winds were respondisble,but it seemed 2 wobble whilst motionless.Then just as it arrived it took off towards the west end of london silently as it had arrived.The whole incident lasted just 10 seconds,i was totlly stunned. it took me nearlly all night 2 get 2 sleep. i didnt know what 2 do, or who 2 tell.It had happened so quickly i didnt have time 2 take any pictures. im so sure that im not the only person 2 have seen this u.F.O,especially when it flew over the main flight path 2 heathrow and then over one of the most busiest cities in the world.Ive always been a realist,and i know what i saw last night was real.I hope there are other witnesses 2 what i saw last sunday evening just 2 verify that im not going mad.Thank you 4 your time and effort into resolving this phenomon.
content.summary: Came 2 a halt from the east slight wobbling,then sped off 2 the west.

content.detailedDescription: I was star gazing and watching for meteors outside of pocono raceway. i regularly star gaze. i usually see what i believe are satellites moving through the sky. they look like slow moving stars. on this night, i had seen a few meteors and there were regular aircraft coming out of avoca airport and flying over from west to east at probably around 3000-5000 feet. around 10:30pm, i saw what i thought was another satellite. i then noticed two other objects of the same size (star size) and color. they were in a triangle formation. i couldn't tell if it was three seperate objects or if they were the lights on one single object. they moved at the same speed and direction and the distance between them never changed while i saw them. i looked at them through my binoculars but it didn't help. i did not notice whether or not i could see stars between the objects so i don't know if it was one solid object or three seperate ones. i only saw them for about two minutes. my video camera will be at my side from now on when i am star gazing in this area.
content.summary: 3 lights. looked like stars but were in a triangle pattern and moving at the same spped and distance from one another.

content.detailedDescription:
I was working early in the am on my laptop. we live in a new development on what once was the weymouth air base in south weymouth ma. i was working on my laptop on my couch. we have a beautiful view of the old air field and about 700 acres of land. you can see very far. so i'm working this am and i see a bright star in the sky just appear all of a sudden. seems strange. i thought it could be plane but i've seen them before and they fly much higher up and are much brighter. this one seems to hover and was going in an upward motion not going toward or away from boston which is what the planes do. i went to get my glasses because i was seeing little sparks coming out of it from the ground. this didn't make sense. i thought it was just my eyes but once i got my distance glasses on i could see this was no airplane, helicopter or anything i have ever seen before.
i immediately trapped my iphone and started recording. i have the video i took i can send you. i then look closer and see that its bobbing a little. it also has this like x pattern where there is one ring of white light it seems going one way and another ring going the other way. they are bright silver and are from what i can tell creating the bobbing. i then steady my camera on the window seal and go to trap my big camera with my 70-200 lens (i'm a wedding photographer so i have that gear) stumbling to get my camera i miss where it went. i hear a noise, then there is nothing. i look around frantically looking to see where the thing went and can't see it anywhere. its as if it just cloaked and disappeared. i look at my iphone and it went out of frame. i have seen all kinds of aircraft and i have never seen anything that looked like this. you can even tell in the video that there is that x pattern and i don't know what kind of object would do this. i know that we are near a high activity place called the bridgewater triangle. if you were to look down the airfield you would be looking directly at bridgewater, ma. i've seen 4th of july fireworks from my apt and all sorts of flares and this was defiantly hovering, moving and just appeared like a huge glowing star in the sky. with my iphone its hard to tell the size and scale but it was at least as big as a car hovering over the fields out there. i'm actually too scared to go look what is in the woods where it was hovering but if i see someone staggering out of there i will know what happened. cops patrol the area a lot here and this was something weird which i had never seen.  i know that this once was a military base that did have nukes once hidden in certain places but they should all be long gone. anyway, i have video of it. i tried to steady the video on the window seal so that it was not shaky and can hand over any video you would like. its not much but its something. this was very cool. i did feel a calm presence with the craft and on a spiritual level i didn't feel threatened. i couldn't communicate with it, nor would i want to. although i am a little spooked telling you about it now. i have never seen anything like this before. it just hovered and looks very scientific. very pretty and glowing like a star, really beautiful and dangerous at the same time.
content.summary: Saw it from my 3rd floor window hovering over the air field it looked like a bright star but it had swirling motions in an x pattern rotating bright silver with white light in the middle. it was wobbly flaring between the two ax. it then flew away.

content.detailedDescription: My husband noticed these lights at sea and told me about them.  he woke me up this morning and they are directly over the ocean.  they just hover, nothing else, but once a boat get close shoots directly into sky.  straight up.  i can see two bright lights and 1 dimmer light.  its here every morning so we thought someone would want to check it out.  i am looking at it presently, i don't feel anything. just a little nervous bc we don't know what it is and it doesn't move at all except to fl up straight out of sight.  we have never seen anything like this before.  it doesn't make any noise.  i took an iphone video, however it doesn't look like anything but a small dot in the sky.  i can email it to you if you are interested.
content.summary: Hovers at 4am for about an hr then shoots directly up.  has been here three days in a row

content.detailedDescription: Ok, so i was at my house in anacortes, wa and i was on the front deck with some binoculars as i wanted to look at the moon because it was full and bright. looking through the binoculars i was checking out all the cool craters on it, than all of a sudden i see what appears to be an "upside down black v object" travel across the moon in a horizontal direction from the bottom right side of the moon to the top left side of the moon. it took the object about 15-25 seconds to cross the moon. it was "massive" the end of the upside down v was very long, compared to the size of the moon in my binoculars it looked like an estimated 1/10 the size of the moon roughly. it appeared to be extremely close to the moons surface as well. never seen anything like it in my life and never saw it again just that one time. the shape was solid, there was no wings, flaps, etc. and i saw it very well with my binoculars. an object that looked like the letter v but upside down and very large, near the end points of the bottom of the object looked sharp and very elongated. i remember shortly after this sighting i made a post on abovetopsecret and only one other person says he saw the exact same thing as me but nobody else and i have not found anything else about it online. can provide more information if you contact me. i drew an exact duplicate picture and report with exact date and time on paper but would have to find it. will get it if you request it.
content.summary: V shaped object over moon

content.detailedDescription: I and my girl friend was outside at our home.And she seen a light in the sky that caught her eye.She ask me to look up and check this out.It was a cigar shaped object and was moving from the south west to the north east at a moderate speed.The first thing i thought it was a passenger jet.But 2 things was missing from this object.No wings and was totally silent.This was the first sighting.The second time a few min later another cigar shaped object following the same flight path but with yellow lights on both ends.The first 1 had white lights look like a flying fluorescent light with a dark circle in the center.This i will never forget its something i will rember all my life.Thankyou
content.summary: Sitting outside light caught our eyes it was cigar shaped and white lights on both ends but had a darker color in the center

content.detailedDescription:
I can put you within 1500 feet or so of an underground tunnel that goes under highway 44...U would need a ground penetrating radar device that can pin point the underground tunnel and its size will exceed 3 car lengths wide and is as tall as a large truck as i did see a tractor trailer go underground at that location. it is less than 20 feet deep if standing in the ditch.
i did witness a flag girl at this highway construction site while driving part of my crew from westlock alberta to the international airport at edmonton, alberta. i was flag stopped at a point within 20 feet of the flag girl to the left of of the highway....Traffic was routed off the highway down into a hollow ditch as the the tunnel intersected at/under the highway and a temporary road ran off the highway into the tunnel. the immediate work area was surrounded on three sides by high mounds of clay. i was able to eyeball the inner work area through a crack in the fence beside the flag girl. the flag girl held a long stationary smile that never wavered, her eyes were black orbs. the flag girl stared at me constant while waving us ahead...The one thing that i remember i had 4 employees in the truck, all hindus; they all sat there in their seats with eyes staring straight ahead, never blinked, never moved their heads, just sat there; i was talking to them while i was looking around inside the work area (it never dawned on me that they were in a trance of some sort)nobody said anything back. i did see a person walk from a point behind the flag girl down into the tunnel with some sort of a clip under their arm; i did see a tractor trailer (gravel box type)travel from a point 1/2  mile away all the way into the work area and go down into the tunnel. i left the work area and continued on towards the airport and to add to that experience, i had moved my crew from that location (westlock) to topley bc a week later. when i checked into my cabin and got settled in...I turned my laptop on and it shut the tv off several times; i thought nothing of it until years later; i should have added this next piece of info to the beginning...
i was a gang foreman with cn rail at the time i worked in westlock alberta. i would drive edmonton to westlock every 14 days as i worked a 10 and 4 cycle. i would drive edmonton to westlock by way of highway 44. 
my first encounter with an unusal sight happened during one of my trips to westlock around 5 in the afternoon; i was northbound roughly 20 minutes on hi 44 when i saw an underground tunnel to my left as i was driving north and in the few seconds i had to stare at this site i could see what appeared to be human forms swinging picks and shovels. i never thought anything of it. on another occasion i was driving this same hiway again going north and i saw this same tunnel, but with cars parked in it (cars were parked both sides backs to the wall and there was room enough for a vehicle to drive down the center; there were dim lights on the walls. again never thought anything of it. after that i never saw the tunnel again until the above mentioned experience under the highway. the only other strange thing i saw on one of my trips was an old farm house (in the area where i saw the tunnel) that used to have pens for whatever (cattle etc.  i did remember seeing animals there)this old farm yard and pens were converted to some sort of dirt beds, but the color of the dirt beds did not jive with earthy tones they were strange colors...
content.summary: Not ufo related, but beings other than normal

content.detailedDescription:
Interesting night, this is my very first mufon report but ive been seeing these objects for a couple years now. this night, aug 17, 2014. i was  on a walk with the 11 year old daughter of my girlfriend (i'm 50) and we were getting some air for her aging pet rat, whom we walk nightly in a little sling.. we always look up as we have noticed objects before together and sure enough within 2 minutes, we noticed another super bright "power-up" ufo that we have witnessed many times the last few summers from time to time when camping near mt hood and mt adams. 

but this was in a well lit parking lot at the mountain park rec center in lake oswego, and there were tons of people at some kind of wedding party inside. it was twilight and stars were just starting to appear. this first object we spotted at 80 degrees overhead  looking to the east and it got extremely arc light white as it "powered up" (for lack of better words)  brighter and brighter then slowly winked out as it moved toward  the south. definitely moved faster than satellites we observe all the time and some of the planes we also observed in the sky. this object was very high up, id have to guess outside our atmosphere. we observed this "power up" at 9:10pm ( checked my phone)  and couldn't believe we had seen one so fast as we actually were talking about hoping we would see one before we went on the walk. 

we then walked around the rec center on walking paths and were celebrating out sighting ... while also splinting out multiple airplanes in the sky with their landing lights and red and green nav lights. explaining to each other how its very easy to tell the difference between a plane and these power ups. 

we then  came back around to the parking lot... saw some people mingling and then i noticed a much lower bright golden orb with white star like spikes like a xmas tree topper moving very slowly and deliberately to the east and silently overhead. i shouted to the 11 year old to look and i pulled out my iphone 5s and began filming before it disappeared behind a tall pine tree.... i was even able to get  an aircraft in sky that made noise in the same video, this golden object however made  no noise as shown on video. i am also familiar with what floating lanterns look like and this did not ascend or descend but moved deliberately and was much brighter and golden white. 

note: i have seen this object before last july 2013 at the eceti ranch in trout lake, wa. that too moved west to east at about 60 degrees and was the exact same craft. well it looked the same i can't say it was the same one. 

i always feel an overwhelming sense of comfort and joy when i see these, never anxiety or excitement its more wonderment and calm... i should also say this was the 11 year old first time seeing the golden orb. i loved that she was there and said "well we both saw it so nobody can say its not true" lol ... 

the best part is she also observed (at the same time we saw the orb and she says it on the video)  that she saw another faint light object moving to the west and much much higher than anything in the sky, but it was clearly (to me) a single white light satellite (which i mention in video) but i thought it was incredible to have the silent object on video... with both an aircraft making noise and a satellite at the same time to clearly differentiate this object we were observing was something very different. 

the golden orb and bright whote light definitely felt benevolent, and intelligent if that makes sense. like we asked for it and they revealed themselves if that makes sense. i'm one to always look for a scientific explanation, peer reviewed studies. but im telling you there is an intelligence here that feels like it knew we were watching and was showing off. 

whether the golden orb was related to the bright power up is hard to say, but our guts tell us it is.  they were very different in terms of speed and the bright white one did not scintillate like a star as the slower moving glowing orb did. i would say the second sighting was between 9:17pm and 9:25pm pst.

i tried to be still in the video so any sudden movements were me, not the object. it floated quietly and effortlessly and almost had a little wobble... the 7 points of light coming out don't really show up on video so maybes its the atmosphere or something but the stars don't look that spiky... like it looks when one squints at xmas light or something. 

that was the most interesting feature. like one of those spoked xmas tree toppers shape wise yet it was clearly a round golden glowing solid object. for what its worth,  it was not all energy like orbs i've seen on you tube... , this seemed like a glowing metallic (maybe) but definitely glowing solid orb. 

as you can see in the video it went behind a tree and when we walked around to try to find it again it was gone.
content.summary: Slow moving glowing orb with scintillating white spokes of white light coming out of it like a floating star.

content.detailedDescription:
Well, 

my wife, daughter and i were on our way home from getting ice cream at our neighborhood foster freeze.  when we appeared a block away from our house on our street, we all noticed a medium sized object--perhaps the size of a school bus or larger from 200-300 meter away, floating in the north west sky of torrance.  at first glance we thought it was an object being towed by a small single engine plane; one similar to that of a plane towing a sign behind it along the coast of a beach.  however, this object was not being towed, as this plane of reference previously mentioned flew east leaving behind the glowing object.  the best way to describe the physical attributes of the object would be to say it was most certainly a circle shape.  it seamed so close that i kept doubting my judgement of what it could possibly be; something that looked like it was on fire, but defied all logic there of.  how could something just be floating along at a leisurely pace, be illuminated by such a orange-yellow glow, and make no sound at all?  i mean this didn't just glow--the center of the circle was more of a solid color--the outer which i would estimate to be 30-40% of total light emitted was such a faded fuzzy burning glow, that i couldn't even match it with something in my brain for reference.  looking back, perhaps staring at a candle in a dark room for a minute would produce the same effect.

after five seconds of initially speculating aloud with my family of what it could be, i pulled out my i phone 4s, and managed to get about 1:10 video of the object.  its path was linear for the most part, unaltered, only slightly deviating from it's observable course when passing behind a large tree.  upon the continued path following the tree, it continued on its destination east bound for approximately fifteen seconds before it began to flicker.  the best way i can describe it is if the direct current of a battery were lifted and reapplied to complete the circuit of a flashlight at intervals of approximately .5 seconds, for approximately three seconds.  following this flicker, all lights were out, and only a small black figure of where the object was could be seen disappearing into the night.  

the story is not over, as approximately thirty seconds after this happened, my family and i all noticed another bright light coming from the south east.  this light was different however.  the object did not seem like it was on fire, floating like a balloon, bouncing along its path.  it most certainly was a fighter jet.  its most distinct characteristics was its triangle shaped frame with small indents along the inside rear wings which gives our fighter jets such a noticeable style.  this fighter jets light was white.  bright white.  something totally opposite of what we just saw.  this appears as if it were out of a movie, and still has me guessing what we just witnessed.  the fighter jet flying at such a low altitude, coming from the direction of where this object just vanished from, and just thirty seconds after witnessing the fireball object is all just too coincidental.  

to coincide with my more scientific thought patterns, i immediately ruled this as a balloon of some sort, but then i began to think of a drone.  however, neither of these were logical due to the fact of this object glowing and appearing to be on fire.  lets think.  what could produce light, but not shine it or direct it?  why when is it that when my family and i were staring at it, not one of us could make out its exact shape.  the glow of yellow/orange had us mesmerized.  a drone is most certainly out of the picture.  of course their range is remarkable, however this object let me remind you was huge.  there is no way a drone could fly/hover the way this did and emit such a captivating aura of light.  

we have this all on video, from our original sight of it in the north west sky, to it flying all the way and eventually disappearing into the east sky.  coupled with the fighter jet not even one minute after our sighting, we are in no way to be convinced otherwise that what we saw tonight was not a ufo.  

a side note:  the attached video, in no way gives absolute justice to what occurred.  the focal range of the i phone is so low to begin with the object appears to be far away (reference to a 2.8-12mm cctv lens to that of a motion picture camera).  let me assure you, this object was large and in charge.  as previously mentioned i would describe it as the size of a school bus in diameter from a distance of about 200-300 meters.
content.summary: Glowing ball on walk home from ice cream w/  fam. no sound, intense orange glow, caught on video!  iphone 4s.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on the 405 around huntington beach
content.summary: Bright soundless orange/red light over seal beach at about 8pm. showed up in the sky and headed west. dissapeared

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside in the dark behind my home. between 1:30 am and 2:30 am i observed a craft in flight from east to west.The window shape dome lights of which look like about six of them on the leading edge of a semi- boomerang shape craft. it made no sounds as it passed over head. there was no flashing lights of any kind like that of a aircraft. i could see the body shape just fine as a solid object. the craft appeared after the line of sight after it flew from trees in the skyline and for several secs until it disappeared behind the roof line of my home.How i notice it after i looked  up in the direction it was at and seen the lights of the windows, my thoughts were it was not a plane, it had to plane safety lights flashing, it had no engines in the front or back. i could not believe what i was looking at as i watch it. and if that was from our military i am impressed.
content.summary: Slow steady flight

content.detailedDescription: I called the following morning after sighting and reported the incident to mufon operator it was a few days ago can't remember the day of incident i'm sorry. it was 12:50 am in the morning when i saw the space craft. it went from east to west. the craft was triangle in shape. it had and odd glow almost like it was trying to cloak its self. there were three lights on the three corners of the object, the lights were white and blinking slowly. there was no noise, it was about the size of a basket ball. when it flew over the craft flew across the sky the point of the craft was slightly to the left when it went across. my heart was pounding with excitement when i witnessed the incident.
content.summary: Sitting on back portch saw space craft over head triangluler in shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in moscow for business, enjoying a park and lake at the novodevichy convent. it was late evening, but still a glow in the air because of the sun being up late during summer months there. there was a cloud lower, but it was thin hazy clouds. i was snapping a photo of the convent from across a lake in the park. out of the corner of my eye i saw a flash. i quickly looked up thinking it was a meteor/shooting star.

what i saw i can best describe as a "rectangle" made up of 3 equal size squares in line. the 2 outside squares were glowing bright electric blue. the inside square was also blue, but had the appearance of being made of a "light ray", or the "glow" mist part of light rays, but had a square form... not being dispersed in all directions like light rays from a light bulb would do. also there were these "rays" made of the "glow", one of each end of the rectangle, they were both equal in size and in the shape of a long pointy triangles. these points were pointing in the direction of travel and behind. they were of the same quality of blue light as the center square, but had form to them.

the whole object shot across the sky super fast, disappearing in the thickness of the clouds closer to the horizon line. it was traveling at about the same speed as meteors and shooting stars do. it was difficult to judge if it was going parallel to the ground, or had a slightly downward angle. it was very fast and unexpected.

2 other friends i was with also saw the same thing and described it the same way.

attached is a google map image of where i was standing, looking across the lake at the convent; one of the photos i took at roughly the same time. i don't recall if it was before or after i saw the object, but within minutes either way (you can get an idea of the hazy evening sky and sunlight level); and a sketch of how the object appeared.
content.summary: 2 square bright blue lights emitting 1 ray each shooting in a straight line through thin low clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving work at chase corporate office in columbus ohio.
i was exiting the way i normally do and since it was later than normal
the gate was locked. so i had to turn around and that is when i noticed the light in the sky. it looked like a red glowing airplane in the sky totally red and glowing. i thought maybe a airplane was on fire. i noticed it did turn or spin one time and saw it glow more bright red. i was really afraid a plane was crashing. last time i saw it around 930 it was still in the sky. by the time i got on the outerbelt 270 going south towards my house i couldn't see it any longer. i know what i saw and wanted to tell someone. wish i would have got a picture of it.
content.summary: Saw brightly glowing red object in the sky thought airplane was crashing

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a flight to tampa with family on august 2nd 2014. 630ish.  we were on concourse d. philadelphia airport.   our flight was delayed.  i was sitting watching the aircraft take off to the left. and watching them come in left to right in the far distance.  i notice a silver orb hovering mid window from the concourse and my point of view.  i was stunned when it hit me what i was looking at.   i notice aircraft stopped coming in from  the distant left tothe right almost directly in front of it. the aircraft conyinued taking off to the left.  i refocused why eyes on the orb.  silver chrome in color.  maybe 5 or 6 seconds passed then it slowly rose up into the lower cloud cover.  i called my son over who was playing video games and whispers what i saw as to not bring attention to ourselves.  we saw nothing.  my wife walked over maybe five min later.  i told her what i saw and we watched the window.  i pointed out how the aircraft looked in the distance and even the lights reflecting in the widow and how none looked like i described.  we watched for a short time then boarded our fight.  i told no-one as i didn't want to cause a scene and possible miss the flight. i believed i may have saw a ufo long ago but now belive it was lights reflecting in my windshield.  this was nothing like it.  i never seen anything like ut.  i am ex military helicopter mech and i worked as a aircraft mech. i am truly stunned by what i saw and still am today three weeks later.
content.summary: Chome silver globe hovered maybe 5 to 10 miles out then slowly rose iinto clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a flight from lisbon to london, may 27, 2012. we were in the landing path to london heathrow airport. i had a window seat on the plane, toward the rear on the left side ("a" seat number). i was staring out the window watching the landscape go by below. i was fixated on an airfield i saw below, a line of cessna and light aircraft parked on the field, and one small personal cessna style aircraft flying really low to the ground below me. i would guess that we were at, or near, 10,000ft elevation. someone could easily calculate the landing path angle into heathrow when the planes are in line with white waltham airfield, and windsor castle fast approaching.

as i was looking at the small single engine plane flying a few hundred feet above the ground, way below me, the movement of something to my right (as i'm looking out the window of the plane) caught my eye, and i saw 3 objects, way off in the distance, just specks. my initial thought was "wow, those birds are flying really high!!". i thought they were birds because of some kind of grouping pattern they were in. as they got closer, i saw one of them reflect sunlight and i thought "those are birds, they're metallic!" this was the moment that they flew past the our plane and i got a very clear view of them. there was 3 metallic spheres, traveling at a very high rate of speed in the opposite direction as our airplane, and they were a little higher than half way between our plane and the ground. there were no windows, no markings, no wings, no protruding shapes or antennas or probes... that i could see. just smooth shiny metal. the formation the objects were in was one in front, the second directly behind the first one... with a gap about 6 or 7 times the width of the objects, and the third behind the second, about a 4 or 5 widths behind, and slight to the right of the second object ("right" in their direction of travel).
using the single engine airplane's wingspan (roughly 30ft) that was flying low to the ground near the airfield as a size reference for comparison, i would put the diameter of each object at about 18-23ft. 

the entire experience lasted about 3 seconds from initial sight (thinking they were birds) until they had gone out of my field of view behind the airplane i was in. there was no noise, no heat signature from propulsion, no visible disturbance of the air, just a straight line and going very very fast.

i've taken thousands of airplane flights for business travel and am familiar with how other airplanes/aircraft appear when they fly near or past each other in the sky. in my estimation, these objects were going as fast as cruising speed for an commercial airliner or slightly faster, (600-650mph+).

once we landed in london and were in line for immigration, i was talking with my work colleagues and said "you guys won't believe what i saw!!". one immediately replied with "those metal balls that flew past the plane?". i said "wow, you saw it too?". then another spoke up and said he had also seen it and shared in confusion about what it was. then a 4th one spoke up, he said he had a middle seat, and an elderly woman sitting next to him at the window hit him with her hand to get his attention and said "did you see that?", but she woke him from sleeping and he missed it.

we were speculating about what it could be. none of us had any ideas, but the one thing i thought was curious was that this happened about 10 days before the start of the london olympics. so we thought that maybe it had to do with some high tech surveillance. but curious why the authorities would fly 3 objects directly over heathrow airport, in the line of an active approach path to commercial airlines, and at such speeds.
content.summary: 3 metallic spheres with no windows or doors flew past an airplane i was in at a very high velocity.

content.detailedDescription: Sighting back around 1962. some of us playing ball and one says whats that in the sky  we all looked up  it was north of us  a big light in the sky.     i looked at it for a period of about 1 hour  and then my mother called me in home for bed. i said it to her 10 years ago and she said it was in the paper locally"strange lights seen over the northside of cork city"  alittle later we had a powercut all over  and while i was going to school at about 8in the morning a light shone down on me 3times from the sky. and i have had many experiences since then i am now nearly 60
content.summary: 9 of us playing ball , one says whats that in the sky, we all looked and saw we went home  newspaper says next day lights in sky over area

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking to my car parked in a residential neighborhood, in a ne direction. i observed an oddly colored red-orange slowly moving across the sky in a slow steady southern direction. at first i thought it was a plane or helicopter, but realized it didn't have the required flashing lights. and it was flicking, like a flame would. i watched it move across the sky for about a minute and it flicked out, disappeared. there wasn't any noise, it didn't change in elevation, just a flickering slightly wave slow moving path.
after the first sighting i was continuing the walk to my car, and through some trees lining the sidewalk i could see a second object of the same description doing the same exact thing. i raced to get out from the field of view of the trees, was pulling my phone out to capture a video, and it had already flickered out by the time i had my camera ready. i didn't see anymore after that.

it had the light characteristics of an asian lantern. it looked like fire/flame light being diffused as if it was inside a paper lantern, but it was too red to be a flame. and it had the slow steady movement of a helium balloon... but wasn't rising in altitude. it had a steady elevation with only lateral movement. at the time of the first object sighting i thought to myself "it looks like something scanning the ground", purely based on the way it was moving... slow and steady.

both objects were about 40 degrees above the horizon. i would estimate they are about a mile to a  mile and a half away. initially i thought it was headlights of an airplane in an odd landing path for long beach airport. but too red, no accompanying red/green/white flashing lights that most aircraft have.

in my field of view there was also low flying airplanes in the flight path to land at long beach airport, and a helicopter farther away on the horizon.
content.summary: Red orange flicking light moving parallel to the ground at a slow speed then flicked out, then repeated again.

content.detailedDescription: Blue orb of star like structure observed in night sky. rapidly elevated completely changed directions and descended then disappeard all within a 6 second observance. i've never seen anything so strange in my life. rapidly moved unlike a plane.
content.summary: Blue orb of light rabidly elevated then descended and disappeard within 6 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
Not much to it.

saw a light in the sky, in broad daylight, could have been anything, but hope someone else saw it.

was outside for a brief moment, could have been more incidents but i saw just the one.

light, orb-ish, very high, emitting lots of energy - colours. not fire. star-like, moving rationally, changing correction a couple times before disappearing over the horizon.
content.summary: Broad daylight, witnessed bright object in the sky, moved with precision, fast, and from southeast to east. vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on mountain ave, heading to the 210 freeway west. i first saw the object while waiting at a light and figured it was some very shiny airplane. i assumed it was at a far distance because of its apparent speed, but when i turned to merge onto the freeway, i realized that it was much closer, and had no wings. it was moving very slowly. i looked away to change lanes, and when i looked back, it was gone.
